    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pervasive Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=89) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=85)

</column>

---

You steep yourself in superstition and practice ancient orc mental exercises for shrugging off the effects of magic. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects at all times.

<title level="2">Pervasive Superstition leads to...</title>
[Spell Devourer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1293)
name: Pervasive Superstition
